page.title: 02 HOUSING.
page.content: Most of the houses, except farms and a few cottages,are in Betley village and there is a large variety. Betley Village is very old with some very old houses mostly along the main road.The oldest houses are black and white,half timbered tudor houses.6% of the houses where built in the 15th and 16th century.15% of the houses were built between 1700 and 1900 these include most of the farms many of which were built by the Fletcher-Twemlow family the local land owners.The majority of houses,were built this century.About 44% of these were built before 1960,a council estate with 66 houses being the biggest group but with a few of semi-detached houses along the main road .Since 1960 a lot of larger detached 4 and 5 bedroom houses have been built these make up 35% of the houses in the area.
